source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_SEQ_00<tab>The affable Kojin gazes at you with large, pondering eyes.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_SEQ_00<tab>碧のタマミズの社交的なコウジン族は、宝物に興味のないヒトを探しているようだ。
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_TODO_00<tab>社交的なコウジン族と話す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_TODO_02<tab>Obtain seabed treasure from the roots of large seaweed stalks.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA6AA01 /var>を調べて<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D7201 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the seabed treasures to the affable Kojin.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_TODO_03<tab>社交的なコウジン族に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D7201 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_000<tab>Oh, would you look at that! We have a visitor, and not just any visitor but one from the above!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_000アンタぁ、外から来たっていう、ヒトだろぉ～。
ぜひともアンタに、力を貸してほしいのさぁ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_001<tab>Might I ask you help with something? You see, I would like to go treasure hunting but need someone to accompany me. If I go with one of the other villagers, they will try to take more than their fair share of our find.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_001宝物探しに行きたいんだけど、範囲が広くてなぁ～。
かといって仲間を連れて行って、取り分で揉めるのも、
なんだか嫌だろぉ～？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_002<tab>You from the surface, however, have no interest in treasure, only koban. For your help you shall receive a handsome sum, so what do you say? If you are willing to join me, meet me outside the Tamamizu gates in a quarter bell.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_002アンタには、ヒト向けの銭ってやつで礼をするから、
こっそり宝探しを手伝ってほしいんだぁ～。
碧のタマミズの外で、待ってるよぉ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_010<tab>Thank you for coming, my good <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((sir)) /var>! Before we begin hunting for treasure in earnest, let us go over the basics. Do you see those great columns of seaweed below us?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_010よく来てくれたなぁ～。
それじゃぁ、宝物の探し方を、教えてやろうかぁ～。
まずは、足下の海藻を見てくれぇ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_011<tab>Treasures are often carried into the areas surrounding our village by the ocean currents and become entangled in the roots and stalks of larger clumps of plants like those.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_011海流の関係で、里の周りには宝物が流れ着くんだぁ～。
流れ着いた宝物は、ああいう海藻に絡まって埋もれてるんだぁ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_012<tab>If you do a bit of tugging on the stalks and rummage about the roots, treasure should appear! Go ahead, and give it a try!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_012だから、海藻の近くを掘れば、宝物が出てくるって寸法よぉ～。
さっそく、試しにひとつ、あの海藻の根元を掘ってみなよぉ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_014<tab>Try digging about the roots and looking at the stalks of those large columns of weeds over there.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_014足下の海藻を見てくれぇ～。
さっそく、試しにひとつ、あの海藻の根元を掘ってみなよぉ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_020<tab>Excellent work, for a beginner! Now let us move on to doing some actual treasure hunting! Oh, and remember not to waste your time searching the smaller clumps of grass. Treasures rarely─if ever─get stuck in them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_020初めてなのに、うまいもんだぁ～。
ひとつ気をつけるのは、短い海藻じゃ宝物が絡まないから、
なるべく長～いやつのあたりを調べるのがコツさぁ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_021<tab>Please go and search the waters near Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato and to the rear of our village. I shall poke about the other areas.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_021その調子で、スイの里の方と、
碧のタマミズの裏の方を調べてくれるかぁ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_022<tab>Once you have collected all the treasure to be found there, I ask that you return to Tamamizu and deliver them to me there.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_022アタシはほかの場所を探すから、そっちは頼んだぞぉ～。
見つけた「」は、全部アタシに渡してくれよぉ～。
碧のタマミズで待ってるからなぁ～。
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_030<tab>宝物は、たくさん見つかったかぁ～？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_031<tab>You have brought back a bounty of porcelain plates, bottles and look─this is a torn zabuton cushion! This is one of the rarer treasures I have possessed to date!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_031おお、こりゃ大漁だぁ～。
真っ白なお皿に、空きビンまであるじゃないかぁ～。
この、破れたザブトンなんて、滅多に見つからないんだぞぉ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_032<tab>Ah, but you bore of this talk. After all, your kind only has an eye for koban. That you would not desire to own such exquisite objects─you are a very strange people, indeed.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_032でも、アンタぁ興味ないんだよなぁ～？
こんなちっさい、金物のほうがいいっていうんだから、
ヒトってのは、不思議なもんだなぁ～。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_033<tab>I suppose, however, I must be thankful for it because that means all the more treasure for us! Haha! Thank you for your help in gathering these for me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. I cannot wait to take them home!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ312_02708_LADYTURTLE02708_000_033アタシらにとっちゃ、嬉しい限りだぁ～。
ありがとうなぁ、優しいヒトよぉ～。
